metadata.title: CVE-2019-5792 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed aremote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memory access via acrafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
